#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<limits.h>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
#include<vector>
#include<map>
#include<stack>
//-------------------
#define ll long long
#define ull unsigned long long
//-------------------
#define MOD 1000000007

using namespace std;
int main(){
	int t,x1,y1,x2,y2,x3,y3,x4,y4;
	ll area;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2>>x3>>y3>>x4>>y4;
		area=(x2-x1)*(y2-y1)+(x4-x3)*(y4-y3);
		x1=x1>x3?x1:x3;//max x
		y1=y1>y3?y1:y3;//max y
		x2=x2<x4?x2:x4;//min x
		y2=y2<y4?y2:y4;//min y
		area-=((x2-x1)>0?(x2-x1):0)*((y2-y1)>0?(y2-y1):0);
		cout<<area<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
